ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Xenobiologis: Aeldari
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6.5.1 Adds plyable WH40k Eldar Requires new start or a faction manager mod to have faction bases on the world map.
This mod includes a compatability patch for the latest version of Combat Extended. Thanks for the assistance Saebbi!
Contents Races: Eldar - Humanlike Wraithguard - Tool User
Dark Eldar - Humanlike Items: Craftworld Colours: Items tagged with CC allow you to toggle between variants for each craftworld when the items on the ground Aeldari Only: Items tagged with AO are Only useable by Aeldari. Eldar Only: Items tagged with EO are Only useable by Eldar. Dark Eldar Only: Items tagged with DEO are Only useable by Dark Eldar.
Apparel: Craftworld Mesh Armour (AO) Mesh Helmet (AO) Ranger Armour (AO) Ranger Helmet (AO) Dire Avenger Armour (AO) Dire Avenger Helmet (AO) Howling Banshee Armour (AO) Howling Banshee Helmet (AO) Striking Scorpion Armour (AO) Striking Scorpion Helmet (AO) Swooping Hawk Armour (AO) Swooping Hawk Helmet (AO) Fire Dragon Armour (AO) Fire Dragon Helmet (AO) Dark Reaper Armour (AO) Dark Reaper Helmet (AO) Warp Spider Armour (AO) Warp Spider Helmet (AO) Warlock Rune Armour (EO) Warlock Helmet (EO) Farseer Rune Armour (EO) Ghosthelm (EO)
Apparel: Dark Eldar Kabalite Armour (AO) Kabalite Helmet (AO) Sybarite Armour (AO) Sybarite Helmet (AO) Wych Suit (AO) Wych Mask (AO) Wych Beastmaster Mask (AO) Hellion Armour (AO) Hellion Helmet (AO) Scourge Armour (AO) Scourge Helmet (AO) Incubi Armour (AO) Incubi Helmet (AO) Incubi Lord Armour (AO) Incubi Lord Helmet (AO) Archon Armour (AO) Archon Helmet (AO)
Wargear: Craftworld Grenade Packs (Plasma, Haywire, Melta, Hallucination) Runes (Warding, Wrath, Fortune)
Wargear: Dark Eldar Grenade Packs (Plasma, Haywire, Melta, Hallucination)
Resources: Wraithbone - a psycho active crafting material used in the almost all Eldar construction Psychic Circuitry - eldar component counterpart Spirit Stones - advanced eldar crafting component, that will eventually be needed for wraithguard/lord construction
Load Order info: Humanoid Alien Races( if used, ideally this should be loaded as close to the top of your list as possible ) SRTS( if used ) Combat Extended( if used ) Astra Militarum Core( if used ) Astra offical addons( if used ) Corruption Core( if used ) Corruption offical addons( if used ) Armoury Magos Xenobiologis( if used ) Playable Orkz,Eldar( This Mod ),Tau,Etc( if used ) order doesnt matter
Credits:
Pagoda: Textures for Mesh Armour, Helmet Ranger Armour, Helmet Dark Reaper Armour, Helmet Dire Avenger Armour, Helmet Fire Dragon Armour, Helmet Howling Banshee Armour, Helmet Swooping Hawk Armour, Helmet Striking Scorpion Armour, Helmet Warp Spider Armour, Helmet Research Benches Manchining Table Smithing Tables Wraithguard
SirLaLaPyon: Textures for All Dark Eldar Apparel
Ogliss: XML, C#, Textures for Everything not listed above!
